blob.summary: Vision document - goopy as lightweight coordination protocol beyond session memory
blob.context: Goopy's minimal architecture (5 types, 3 scopes, 4 statuses, 850 LOC) is an unexpectedly powerful substrate for multi-agent coordination, design workflows, project management, and knowledge graphs. Key insight: blobs are a coordination protocol with built-in relevance scoring and semantic linking.
